sentence: South  Africa  is  seeking  preliminary  orders  to  compel  Israel  to  stop  its  military  campaign  in  Gaza,  where  more  than  23,000  people  have  died,  according  to  the  Gaza  Health  Ministry,  which  is  run  by  Hamas.
Israel  has  focused  attention  on  the  Oct.  7  attacks,  when  Hamas  fighters  stormed  through  several  communities  and  killed  some  1,200  people,  mainly  civilians.
About  two-thirds  of  the  dead  in  Gaza  are  women  and  children,  health  officials  in  Hamas-ruled  Gaza  say.
"Mothers,  fathers,  children,  siblings,  grandparents,  aunts,  cousins  are  often  all  killed  together.
